products.title: Aquataine, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The aquataine charcoal is a sophisticated affair, mingling classic florals with slate and dove greys on a soft white canvas. This blind is a classy and stylish one, and you'll find that it adds a modish edge to any room it's placed in. Place a romantic take on monochrome, using the charcoal in a contemporary living room amongst a range of linens, wools, and voiles in greys, blacks, and whites. Choose ornaments and accessories in brushed silver or modern pewter to complement the scheme.

products.title: Art Deco, Cherry - Roman Blind
products.description: In rich berry red, the art deco in cherry is quite the eye-catcher. The bold base is adorned with art deco florals in teals, aquas, camels, and peaches, forming a wild and colourful canvas that simply cannot be missed. Dramatise your dining room, adding in the cherry as the central feature. Paint the walls in the pale peach found in the floral design, and keep the stronger colours for smaller accents.

products.title: Acanthus, Cornflower - Roman Blind
products.description: The vibrant, retro-esque print of the acanthus cornflower is pretty and eye-catching, sitting in lively cornflower blues and hushed apple greens. The soft oatmeal of the fabric tames the look, and the result is a gorgeously vintage style roman blind with both classic and contemporary overtones. Revive a dull kitchen with the addition of the cornflower. Choose wooden units, and garnish the table with linens and cushions in matching green and blue hues.

products.title: Fandango, Zinc - Roman Blind
products.description: The unusual look of the fandango zinc is a real eye-catcher. A jet black background is home to tropical foliage in zesty shades of grass green, candy pink, and turquoise blue and the effect is simply stunning. The zinc should be the star of the show so place it against a turquoise feature wall in your dining room, where it can take centre stage as the focal point of the room. Keep furniture up-to-date and contemporary, accessorising throughout the room with pink and green ornaments and wall art.

products.title: Amelie, Tearose - Roman Blind
products.description: Perhaps the most vibrant of the rustic amelie range, the pretty tearose is filled with wispy florals in tropical fuschia, pale coral, and soft grey. The grainy, dark cream backdrop, combined with the hessian-like cloth, adds to the vivid country style of this blind. Embrace a rural and romantic vibe in the master bedroom, using the sweet tearose as your base. Paint the walls in soft cream or baby pink, using chunky wooden furniture with a polished finish.

products.title: Fandango, Cranberry - Roman Blind
products.description: The beautiful fandango in cranberry is every bit as fantastic as it sounds, with naturally drawn foliage in stunningly tropical colours. And, made from 100% cotton, its high quality fabric sits prettily in neat, roman folds, looking just gorgeous wherever it's placed. Use the cranberry to breathe life into the master bedroom, surrounding it with matching fuchsias, purples, greens, and mustards, as well as some neutrals for toning.

products.title: Fandango, Cassis - Roman Blind
products.description: The tropical colour scheme of the fandango cassis will breathe life into any dcor scheme. Gorgeously rich foliage in bright fuchsia and apple greens adorn a creamy background, making this the perfect choice for colour lovers. Add the cassis to your spare bedroom for a colour scheme your guests will fall in love with. Place against an apple green feature wall, painting the other walls in creamy white.

products.title: Amelie, Primrose - Roman Blind
products.description: The amelie in primrose incorporates a delightfully cheerful lemon yellow and a range of wild leafy greens, anchored to a hessian-style background in oatmeal. The end result is a wild country chic, tempered only by the structured cut of the gorgeous roman style. Ditch the traditional turquoise and go for a balmy lemon colour scheme in your bathroom instead. Plump for rustic wooden floors, a roll-top bath, and yellow and cream tiling, choosing towels and bathmats in chalky sage.

products.title: Botanica, Willow - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty botanica in willow brings the outside in, with it's natural oatmeal base that's scattered with fern illustrations in various shades of green. The fabric is light and versatile, making it perfect for the gentle folds of the roman blind. Ideal for hanging in a sunroom or casual sitting room, the willow would look stunning amidst other neutral tones and one or two natural greens. Include plenty of linens, wools, and other natural fabrics for a look that will put you and your guests instantly at ease.

products.title: Botanica, Heather - Roman Blind
products.description: Fashion an elegant yet natural atmosphere by adopting the botanica heather, a delicate, pond-themed print featuring ferns and grasses in dark sages and muted indigos. This pretty roman blind allows the linen fabric, lined with protective polycotton sateen, to fold beautifully into soft pleats. Convert your plain conservatory to a relaxing haven, full of natural colours, fabrics, and woods. Choose matching green and heather shades to complement those in the heather, and be sure to add plenty of oxygen-emitting plants to add to the outdoorsy feel.

products.title: Amelie, Wedgewood - Roman Blind
products.description: In soft, porcelain blues, wistful florals sit on a grainy cream background, making up the amelie in wedgewood. The fabric is nimble and mild, with the feel of the lightest of hessians, and it folds easily into the gathered pleats of the roman. Craft a scheme of vintage bliss, with a hint of romance, in the master bedroom, painting the walls a barely-there blue or sticking to classic cream. Fill the room with plenty of natural, country fabrics, such as linens, hessians, and wools.

products.title: Vogue, Beige - Day Night Blind
products.description: In subtle peachy cream, the vogue in beige is a soft and appealing blind, comprising of pliable, tightly stitched fabric and clear, see-through strips. All brackets and controls are concealed neatly in the overhead rail cassette, keeping the look clean and tidy. Pair the beige with pretty corals for a sweet and summery aesthetic in the living room. This 'peaches 'n' cream' look can be easily achieved by sticking to a base of cream and furnishing and accessorising with the coral tones, using them for throws, cushions, and wall hangings.

products.title: Vogue, Cream - Day Night Blind
products.description: The subtle off-white of the vogue offers a clean and contemporary aesthetic without the starkness of pure white, making it ideal for those looking for a slightly softer or warmer feel. The fabric is smooth to the touch, making for a streamlined look and easy handling. Settle the cream amidst an autumnal colour scheme in the kitchen, pairing it with burnt oranges and fellow creams. Add plenty of bold, leafy patterns for depth and contrast, and include dark woods to enhance the feeling of warmth.

products.title: Lottie Silver Grey Curtain
products.description: The lottie silver curtain uses a cool and sparkling silver shade that is ideal for a clean and sharp contemporary scheme. The woven jacquard style gives depth and texture to the intricate fern leaf design and teamed with a full lining, this curtain is sure to look luxurious at any window.
